text: It's nice to see both Breath of Fire games on the SNES VC for Switch now. Since they're the only 2 RPGs on the service for now, I'm hoping it brings more people to this series so that someday, hopefully, we get a true sequel (I refuse to acknowledge BoF 6). Breath of Fire II is actually my favorite in the series.
author: SupraDarky

text: @sebs2306live2 I don't know if I would call myself a musician, but I do compose music from time to time. It's been a while now though. You can check out my Original and remixes playlist!
